select ta.id as "id" ,ta.acti_name as "actiName" ,ta.acti_address as "actiAddress" ,ta.acti_status as "actiStatus" ,date_format(ta.acti_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiStartTime" ,date_format(ta.acti_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiEndTime" ,ta.apply_num as "applyNum" ,ta.acti_like as "actiLike" ,ta.acti_number as "actiNumber" ,ta.acti_poster_url as "actiPosterUrl" ,ta.show_apply_num as "showApplyNum" from tb_activity ta left join tb_activity_detail td on td.activity_id = ta.id where 1=1 and ta.acti_status not in ('1','5') and ta.record_status != 0
and ta.acti_type = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ta.acti_start_time >= concat(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}," 00:00:00")
and ta.acti_start_time <= concat(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}," 23:59:59")
and ta.acti_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or ta.acti_address LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or td.acti_detail LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')
order by
${orderBy} desc,
ta.acti_order desc

select ta.id as "id" ,ta.acti_name as "actiName" ,ta.acti_address as "actiAddress" ,date_format(ta.acti_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiStartTime" ,date_format(ta.acti_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiEndTime" ,ta.apply_num as "applyNum" ,ta.acti_like as "actiLike" ,ta.acti_number as "actiNumber" ,ta.acti_poster_url as "actiPosterUrl" ,ta.show_apply_num as "showApplyNum" ,ta.acti_status as "actiStatus" ,(select count(1) from tb_activity ta1 where ta1.acti_status not in ('1','5') and ta1.record_status != 0 and ta1.acti_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as "actiNum" ,(select count(1) from tb_activity ta2 where ta2.acti_status not in ('1','5') and ta2.record_status != 0 and ta2.acti_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ta2.acti_start_time > date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and ta2.acti_start_time < date_add(now(), interval 1 day)) as "weekNum" ,(select count(1) from tb_activity ta3 where ta3.acti_status not in ('1','5') and ta3.record_status != 0 and ta3.acti_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ta3.acti_start_time > date_add(now(), interval -1 month ) and ta3.acti_start_time < date_add(now(), interval 1 day)) as "monthNum" from tb_activity ta left join tb_activity_detail td on td.activity_id = ta.id where 1=1 and ta.acti_status not in ('1','5') and ta.record_status != 0
and ta.acti_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ta.acti_start_time >= concat(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}," 00:00:00")
and ta.acti_start_time <= concat(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}," 23:59:59")
and ta.acti_start_time > date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and ta.acti_start_time < date_add(now(), interval 1 day)
and ta.acti_start_time > date_add(now(), interval -1 month ) and ta.acti_start_time < date_add(now(), interval 1 day)
order by ta.acti_start_time desc, ta.acti_order desc
